page.title: 15My hobbies - horse riding
page.content: My hobby is horse riding. I go to Lane Farm which is just down the road from our house. I go with my sister Susan and my best friend Kylie usually goes with us. The clothes you wear are jhodpurs or trousers, a riding jacket or a jumper, wellies, riding boots or jhodpur boots and a hat which is essential. You can get a crash hat which is the safest hat you can get. You must wear a hat because if you fall off it could save you from serious head injuries. I enjoy going because it is fun and I like the fresh air. I like sitting on the pony and cantering along and doing jumps. It is an interesting hobby and I like it very much.
